page.title: 05THE NURSERY AT RISELEY
page.content: Mr. Wilkinson owns and runs a flower nursery business in Riseley. In the l940's the farm was bought by Mr. Wilkinson's father. Three years later he established some greenhouses on some of the land to produce flowers for the florists' trade. In the l950's these had become so successful that it became a separate business and the present Mr. Wilkinson took them over when he was 20. There are two and a half acres of greenhouses altogether. Three men and six women are full time workers, planting, pricking and disbudding carnations, chrysanthemums and alstameria. (cont)
